Html:
Hello ,

Can i use Oxite in a MVC 2.0 Environment?

Thanks

I don't know for sure since I haven't tried it and Oxite isn't being further developed so there won't be anything from us about MVC 2.0, but I believe I read somewhere that someone tried it and it was extremely trivial to get Oxite working with MVC 2.0.  Give it a try!
